query.pigql: q= load "test_csv_1";q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by {{column(BusinessUnitDescript_2.selection,["BusinessUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("BusinessUnitDescription1")}};q = filter q by 'Object_account_new' == "4 digit";q=filter q by {{column(static_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("BU_Category")}};q=filter q by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];q=filter q by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value_PCP").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];a=group a by all;a=foreach a generate abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group a by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(a[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11","E90", "E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Gross Profit" then sum(c['Value']) when   "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="EBIT" then sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']) when  "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Net Profit" then sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value])  end) as 'sum_Value1';

q= load "test_csv_1";q = filter q by 'Object_account_new' == "4 digit";q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by {{column(BusinessUnitDescript_2.selection,["BusinessUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("BusinessUnitDescription1")}};q=filter q by {{column(static_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("BU_Category")}};q=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New'=="Actuals";q=filter q by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];q=filter q by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];a=group a by all;a=foreach a generate abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C27", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90", "C99"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group a by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(a[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11","E90", "E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group a by all, c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Gross Profit" then sum(c['Value'])/sum(a['Value'])*100 when   "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="EBIT" then (sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']))/sum(a['Value'])*100  when  "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Net Profit" then (sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value]))/sum(a['Value'])*100   end) as 'sum_Value2';

q= load "test_csv_1";q = filter q by 'Object_account_new' == "4 digit";q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by {{column(BusinessUnitDescript_2.selection,["BusinessUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("BusinessUnitDescription1")}};q=filter q by {{column(static_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("BU_Category")}};q=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New'=="Budget";q=filter q by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];q=filter q by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];a=group a by all;a=foreach a generate coalesce(abs(sum(Value)),0) as 'Value';b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C27", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90", "C99"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate coalesce(sum(Value),0) as 'Value';c=group a by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate coalesce(sum(a[Value]),0)-coalesce(sum(b[Value]),0) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11", "E90","E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate coalesce(sum(Value),0) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate coalesce(sum(Value),0) as 'Value';f=group c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Gross Profit" then coalesce(sum(c['Value']),0) when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="EBIT" then coalesce(sum(c['Value']),0)-coalesce(sum(d['Value']),0) when  "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Net Profit" then coalesce(sum(c[Value]),0)-coalesce(sum(d[Value]),0)-coalesce(sum(e[Value]),0)  end) as 'sum_Value1';

q = load "test_csv_1"; a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New'; a=foreach a generate {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,0,"Value"),0).asObject()}} as Value; b = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Budget"; b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New'; b=foreach b generate {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,1,"Value"),0).asObject()}} as Value; c=cogroup a by all,b by all; c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(b.Value))*100 as Result;

q= load "test_csv_1";q = filter q by 'Object_account_new' == "4 digit";q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by {{column(BusinessUnitDescript_2.selection,["BusinessUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("BusinessUnitDescription1")}};q=filter q by {{column(static_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("BU_Category")}};q=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New'=="Forecast";q=filter q by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];q=filter q by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];n=filter a by !('Business_Unit' in ["9900", "9951", "9953", "9959", "9991", "9993", "9995", "9999"]);x=group n by all;x=foreach x generate abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';m=filter a by 'Business_Unit' in ["9900", "9951", "9953", "9959", "9991", "9993", "9995", "9999"];k=group m by all;k=foreach k generate -abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';u=union x,k;b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C27", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90", "C99"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group u by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(u[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11","E90", "E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Gross Profit" then coalesce(sum(c['Value']),0) when   "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="EBIT" then sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']) when  "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Net Profit" then sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value])  end) as 'sum_Value1';

q = load "test_csv_1"; a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New'; a=foreach a generate {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,0,"Value"),0).asObject()}} as Value; b = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Forecast"; b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New'; b=foreach b generate {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,2,"Value"),0).asObject()}} as Value; c=cogroup a by all,b by all; c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(b.Value))*100 as Result;

q = load "test_csv_1"; a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New'; a=foreach a generate {{cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,0,"Value").asObject()}} as Value; b = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New'; b=foreach b generate {{cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,3,"Value").asObject()}} as Value; c=cogroup a by all,b by all; c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(a.Value))*100 as Result;

b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group z by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(z[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11", "E90","E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Gross Profit" then sum(c['Value']) when   "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="EBIT" then sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']) when  "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Net Profit" then sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value])  end) as 'sum_Value1';

 {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];a=foreach a generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Budget" as Type;b=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals";b=filter b by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};b=filter b by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];b=foreach b generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Actuals" as Type;c=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals";c=filter c by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value_PCP").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};c=filter c by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];c=foreach c generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Last Year" as Type;d=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Forecast";d=filter d by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};d=filter d by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];d=foreach d generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Forecast" as Type;e=union a,b,c,d;e=group e by Type;e=foreach e generate Type as Type, abs(sum(Value)) as Value; m=filter q by 'Business_Unit' in ["9900", "9951", "9953", "9959", "9991", "9993", "9995", "9999"]; g=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Budget"; g=filter g by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}}; g=filter g by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; g=foreach g generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Budget" as Type; h=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; h=filter h by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}}; h=filter h by {{column(Fiscal_Year_1.selection,["FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal"]).asEquality("FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal")}}; h=filter h by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; h=foreach h generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Actuals" as Type; i=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; i=filter i by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value_PCP").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}}; i=filter i by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; i=foreach i generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Last Year" as 'Type'; j=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Forecast"; j=filter j by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}}; j=filter j by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; j=foreach j generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Forecast" as Type; z=union g,h,i,j; z=group z by Type; z=foreach z generate Type as Type, sum(Value) as 'Value';p=union e,z; p=group p by Type;p=foreach p generate sum(Value) as 'Value', Type as 'Type';

u=foreach u generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Forecast" as Type; v=union r,s,t,u; v=group v by Type; v=foreach v generate Type as Type, sum(Value) as Value;w=group p by Type,v by Type;w=foreach w generate sum(p.Value)-sum(v.Value) as 'Value', p.Type as 'Type';

q= load "test_csv_1";q = filter q by 'Object_account_new' == "4 digit";q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by {{column(BusinessUnitDescript_2.selection,["BusinessUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("BusinessUnitDescription1")}};q=filter q by {{column(static_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("BU_Category")}};q=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New'=="Budget";q=filter q by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];q=filter q by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day')")}};a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];a=group a by all;a=foreach a generate abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C27", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90", "C99"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group a by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(a[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10","E90", "E11", "E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group a by all,c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Gross Profit" then sum(c['Value'])/sum(a['Value'])*100 when   "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="EBIT" then (sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']))/sum(a['Value'])*100 when  "{{cell(step_NPAT.selection,0,"display").asObject()}}"=="Net Profit" then (sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value]))/sum(a['Value'])*100  end) as 'sum_Value2';

q= load "test_csv_1";q=filter q by 'CalenderMonth' in all;q=filter q by 'Ledger_Type'=="AA";q=filter q by date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day') in all;q=filter q by date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day') in all;a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];a=group a by all;a=foreach a generate sum(Value) as 'Value';b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group a by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(a[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11", "E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "Gross Profit"=="Gross Profit" then sum(c['Value']) when   "Gross Profit"=="Net Profit" then sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']) when  "Gross Profit"=="EBIT" then sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value])  end) as 'sum_Value1';

q= load "test_csv_1";q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by 'BusinessUnitDescription1' in all;q=filter q by 'BU_Category' in all;q=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' in ["Actuals"];q=filter q by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];q=filter q by date('Period_Year', 'Period_Month', 'Period_Day') in all;a=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31", "R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"];a=group a by all;a=foreach a generate abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';b=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["C10", "C11", "C12", "C13", "C14", "C15", "C20", "C21", "C24", "C26", "C27", "C29", "C30", "C31", "C32", "C34", "C35", "C41", "C42", "C45", "C46", "C47", "C48", "C49", "C50", "C51", "C52", "C53", "C54", "C56", "C57", "C71", "C73", "C81", "C82", "C83", "C84", "C90", "C99"];b=group b by all; b=foreach b generate sum(Value) as 'Value';c=group a by all, b by all;c=foreach c generate sum(a[Value])-sum(b[Value]) as 'Value';d=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["E01", "E02", "E03", "E04", "E05", "E06", "E07", "E08", "E09", "E10", "E11","E90", "E91"];d=group d by all;d=foreach d generate sum(Value) as 'Value';e=filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["I01", "I02", "T01"];e=group e by all;e=foreach e generate sum(Value) as 'Value';f=group a by all,c by all, d by all, e by all;f=foreach f generate (case when "Net Profit"=="Gross Profit" then sum(c['Value'])/sum(a['Value'])*100 when   "Net Profit"=="EBIT" then (sum(c['Value'])-sum(d['Value']))/sum(a['Value'])*100 when  "Net Profit"=="Net Profit" then (sum(c[Value])-sum(d[Value])-sum(e[Value]))/sum(a['Value'])*100  end) as 'sum_Value2';

q = load "test_csv_1";q = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Budget";q = group q by 'Ledger_Type_New';q=foreach q generate ({{coalesce(cell(Type_1.result,1,"Value"),0).asObject()}}/ {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,1,"Value"),0).asObject()}})*100 as Value;

q = load "test_csv_1"; q1 = group q by 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal' as 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal', avg('Fiscal_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Fiscal_Year_1.selection,["FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal"]).asEquality("FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal' as 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Fiscal_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate -(floor(((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-1))-1) as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "test_csv_1"; q1 = group q by 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal' as 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal', avg('Fiscal_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Fiscal_Year_1.selection,["FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal"]).asEquality("FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal' as 'FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Fiscal_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate -(floor((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-1)) as 'Year_Diff';

q=load "test_csv_1";q = filter q by 'Object_account_new' == "4 digit";q=filter q by {{column(BusinessUnitDescript_2.selection,["BusinessUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("BusinessUnitDescription1")}};q=filter q by {{column(Static_month_1.selection,["value"]).asEquality("CalenderMonth")}};q=filter q by {{column(static_1.selection, ["value"]).asEquality("BU_Category")}};q=filter q by {{column(Account_Description_2.selection, ["AccountUnitDescription1"]).asEquality("AccountUnitDescription1")}};q=filter q by {{column(FinalDS_Account_BU_C_2.selection, ["Acc.Account_Cat_1"]).asEquality("Acc.Account_Cat_1")}};q = filter q by 'Acc.Account_Cat_1' in ["R01", "R02", "R03", "R05", "R10", "R11", "R12", "R20", "R21", "R22", "R29", "R30", "R31","R32", "R33", "R34", "R40", "R41", "R42", "R43", "R44", "R45", "R50", "R52", "R53", "R55", "R56", "R60", "R70", "R71", "R72", "R73", "R74", "R75", "R80", "R81", "R82", "R83", "R84", "R85", "R90"]; n=filter q by !('Business_Unit' in ["9900", "9951", "9953", "9959", "9991", "9993", "9995", "9999"]); a=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Budget";a=filter a by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; a=filter a by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; a=foreach a generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Budget" as Type; b=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; b=filter b by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; b=filter b by {{column(Fiscal_Year_1.selection,["FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal"]).asEquality("FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal")}}; b=filter b by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; b=foreach b generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Actuals" as Type; c=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; c=filter c by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value_PCP").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; c=filter c by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; c=foreach c generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Last Year" as 'Type'; d=filter n by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Forecast"; d=filter d by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; d=filter d by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=foreach d generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Forecast" as Type; e=union a,b,c,d; e=group e by Type; e=foreach e generate Type as Type, sum(Value) as 'Value'; e=foreach e generate Type as 'Type',abs(sum(Value)) as Value; m=filter q by 'Business_Unit' in ["9900", "9951", "9953", "9959", "9991", "9993", "9995", "9999"]; g=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Budget"; g=filter g by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; g=filter g by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; g=foreach g generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Budget" as Type; h=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; h=filter h by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; h=filter h by {{column(Fiscal_Year_1.selection,["FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal"]).asEquality("FiscalPeriod_Year_Fiscal")}}; h=filter h by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; h=foreach h generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Actuals" as Type; i=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; i=filter i by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value_PCP").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; i=filter i by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(LYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; i=foreach i generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Last Year" as 'Type'; j=filter m by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Forecast"; j=filter j by {{cell(step_relative_date.selection, 0, "saql_step_value").asDateRange("date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day')")}}; j=filter j by date('FiscalPeriod_Year', 'FiscalPeriod_Month', 'FiscalPeriod_Day') in ["current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current fiscal_year -  {{cell(CYYear.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; j=foreach j generate sum('Value') as 'Value',"Forecast" as Type; z=union g,h,i,j; z=group z by Type; z=foreach z generate Type as Type, -abs(sum(Value)) as 'Value';p=union e,z; p=group p by Type;p=foreach p generate coalesce(sum(Value),0) as 'Value', Type as 'Type';

q = load "test_csv_1";a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals";a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New';a=foreach a generate {{coalesce(column(Value_1.result,["sum_Value1"]),0).asObject()}} as Value;b=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Forecast";b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New';b=foreach b generate {{coalesce(column(Value_3.result,["sum_Value1"]),0).asObject()}} as Value;c=cogroup a by all,b by all;c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(b.Value))*100 as Result;

q = load "test_csv_1";a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals";a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New';a=foreach a generate {{coalesce(column(Value_1.result,["sum_Value1"]),0).asObject()}} as Value;b=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals";b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New';b=foreach b generate {{coalesce(column(Value_4.result,["sum_Value1"]),0).asObject()}} as Value;c=cogroup a by all,b by all;c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(b.Value))*100 as Result;

q = load "test_csv_1"; a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New'; a=foreach a generate {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,0,"Value"),0).asObject()}} as Value; b = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals"; b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New'; b=foreach b generate {{coalesce(cell(Ledger_Type_3.result,3,"Value"),0).asObject()}} as Value; c=cogroup a by all,b by all; c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(b.Value))*100 as Result;

q = load "test_csv_1";a = filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Actuals";a = group a by 'Ledger_Type_New';a=foreach a generate {{coalesce(column(Value_1.result,["sum_Value1"]),0).asObject()}} as Value;b=filter q by 'Ledger_Type_New' == "Budget";b = group b by 'Ledger_Type_New';b=foreach b generate {{coalesce(column(Value_2.result,["sum_Value1"]),0).asObject()}} as Value;c=cogroup a by all,b by all;c=foreach c generate ((sum(a.Value)-sum(b.Value))/sum(b.Value))*100 as Result;
